welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sparks, where the friendly locals, charming downtown area, and beautiful natural scenery await you. Known for its vibrant arts scene and annual events, we invite you to explore all that Sparks has to offer and enjoy your stay to the fullest.

restaurants.name: Squeeze In
restaurants.description: Squeeze In is a breakfast spot located in Sparks.
restaurants.address: 4670 Sparks Blvd #110 (at Disc Dr), Sparks, NV 89436

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reno-Tahoe International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Reno-Tahoe International Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Carson City Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Carson City Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Truckee-Tahoe Airport handles all commercial flights and has various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Truckee-Tahoe Airport is used for private and corporate flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
